text: The 1949–50 Segunda División season was the 19th since its establishment and was played between 3 September 1949 and 30 April 1950. ==Overview before the season== 32 teams joined the league, including two relegated from the 1948–49 La Liga and 18 promoted from the 1948–49 Tercera División. ;Relegated from La Liga: *Alcoyano *Sabadell ;Promoted from Tercera División: *Orensana *Osasuna *Lérida *Plus Ultra *Albacete *Atlético Tetuán *Arosa *Gimnástica Torrelavega *Zaragoza *Salamanca *Elche *Real Córdoba *Numancia *Linense *Mallorca *Lucense *Cartagena *Erandio ==Group North== ===Teams=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" !
